channel.title: New local problems on FixMyStreet
channel.description: The latest local problems reported by users

item.title: Fencing come away from post, 18th August
item.description:
The fencing is in a very bad state of repair and has come away from the posts. There is a private alleyway serving 3 houses and this broken gem give access to the rear gardens of the houses. Last time this happed one of the gardens she’d was broken into. This needs fixing immediately.
Nearest road to the pin placed on the map (automatically generated by OpenStreetMap): Bourne Road, Widmore, London
Report on FixMyStreet

item.title: Builder shutting pavement, 18th August
item.description:
The builders have been shutting areas of the pavement for the last few days. They additionally park a lorry next to it and there's no safe pedestrian route. Walking around the lorry puts people in the centre of the road
Nearest road to the pin placed on the map (automatically generated by OpenStreetMap): 136, Randolph Avenue, Maida Vale, London
Report on FixMyStreet

item.title: Land lord not good, 18th August
item.description:
I am writing to request urgent assistance with an issue concerning my electricity bill. I recently received a bill for £1,300, which appears to cover electricity for the entire building at 44 Kinaston Road. However, I only live in a one-bedroom apartment
Nearest address to the pin placed on the map (from OS Places API): Kynaston Road, Hackney, London

item.description:

item.title: Leading all over the street, 18th August
item.description:
Lots of leafing near the pavement of entire road. When there is rain or someone washes the car water flow is blocked. The leafing needs to be cleared manually.

Nearest road to the pin placed on the map (automatically generated by OpenStreetMap): 47, Beverley Road, Anerley, London

item.title: Flytipped sofa, 18th August
item.description:
Someone has abandoned a sofa in my front garden at 22b Doddington Grove. Please advise on when you can remove it. Thanks.

Nearest road to the pin placed on the map (automatically generated by OpenStreetMap): 22, Doddington Grove, Elephant and Castle, London

item.title: Random fly tipping items/hedge, 18th August
item.description:
Random furniture parts and pile of mud/leaves next to the tree. The pathway again is getting taken over by the hedge and pathway covered in weeds. A blind lady as stated before, uses this path on a regular basis often venturing into the road for a clear path. Not acceptable.

Nearest road to the pin placed on the map (automatically generated by OpenStreetMap): Mottingham Road, Coldharbour, London
Report on FixMyStreet

item.title: Drains in Apartment are blocked., 18th August
item.description:
Drains are not draining efficiently. All house drains are affected, so they must be from the roadside.
Nearest road to the pin placed on the map (automatically generated by OpenStreetMap): 32, Montpelier Street, Knightsbridge, London

item.title: Overgrown hedges on Hitherwood Drive, 18th August
item.description:
The hedges are usually trimmed regularly by Southwark Council, but they have not been cut for some months now. At points the pavement is becoming difficult for people in wheelchairs or parents pushing prams. They have also become a hazard for people trying to back out of driveways.

Nearest road to the pin placed on the map (automatically generated by OpenStreetMap): Hitherwood Drive, London
Report on FixMyStreet

item.title: Fly tipping on pavement a few metres down Westdale Road, 18th August
item.description:
On Westdale Road's pavement opposite 6A, there are a couple of clear sacks of rubbish that were first reported on 1st July (FixMyStreet ref: 7791730). People are now dumping other rubbish and litter here. Please can it all be cleared before this turns into another fly tipping hotspot.

Nearest road to the pin placed on the map (automatically generated by OpenStreetMap): Westdale Road, Shooters Hill, London
